articles.description: Handyman sends customer a video of cat using cat flap he just installed, gets alarming text in return, video goes viral.
articles.content: There are so many reasons to love cats. Their bleps, beans, and bizarre antics all add up to make them companions quite unlike any other. Of course, domestic cats don’t do that much hunting, but that… [+4191 chars]
